trait.name: Antennae
text: The giant moth has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Proboscis
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Powdery Wings (1/Day)
text: A 10-foot radius cloud of fine powder disperses from the giant moth. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.
